author: timbeiko
content:
Based on today's discussion, I put up a PR with a suggestion of block  **1735371** for the Sepolia "merge block" upgrade: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/pull/564

It would be great if all client teams could review/+1 before EOD tomorrow so that it can be implemented by teams early next week before the Goerli releases. Also, if teams can calculate and sanity check the fork hash resulting from this upgrade, I'll add it to the spec ðŸ˜„
